title: Evidence-Based STEM Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Daily 15-minute modular learning using personal devices, emphasizing STEM problem-solving strategies applicable in elementary education.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze real-world problems following the scientific inquiry process
Learners can perform evidence-based decision-making processes with at least 80% accuracy
Learners can collaboratively propose actionable design solutions for STEM problem-solving with peers
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
